title: Vertical Jump Calculator – Measure Height & Estimate Power

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Jump height from flight time \( h = \dfrac{g \cdot t^2}{8} \) where: \(h\) = jump height (metres) \(t\) = flight time (seconds) \(g\) ≈ 9.81 m/s² (acceleration due to gravity)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Sayers peak power equation Peak Power (W) = 60.7 × jump height (cm) + 45.3 × body mass (kg) − 2055
